name: 4Chan Protoype game theme
description:
Just a theme moded from another theme that was made by other themes.

WORKS BEST WITH 1333 x 768, or XXXX x 768, if you want I can make it custom for your resolution, drop me an Email at blood_asp101@yahoo.com with your resolution and I will do what I can ^_^

Or if you would like, here is a zip with all the pics I used to make this style, including a high rez of the background, edit them as you wish!
http://www.megaupload.com/?d=P8DF7I64

Screenshot:
http://img366.imageshack.us/img366/9549/protoypethemescreen.jpg


Just did a recent edit, all comments now have blurred backgrounds same for selected comments.
